title: Sweet Deception: A Novel - Tara Bond

Eight years ago, Charlie lost her brother in a mountaineering accident. Sheâ€™s come a long way since, or rather has fallen a long way downâ€¦A drop out, an alcoholic, and promiscuous to boot, she is a constant disappointment to her family.

One night Charlie goes too far and Richard is her only option for help. Can he break through and stop her lying to herself? Or will Charlie finally succeed in tumbling over the edgeâ€¦
